name: Karma DAO
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Karma DAO is a crypto startup pitching forum for angel investors. Startups are invited to pitch for fundraising to the Karma DAO community. To be part of the community, one must own 200 KARMA tokens. The community includes entrepreneuers, fund managers, angels and traders. The DAO also emphasizes values around paying it forward, being value-add and reciprocation.
